remarks: A criterion for determining whether one topology is finer than another. Lemma 2.2 of [Munkres] p. 80 using abbreviations.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
statement: tgss3 $p |- ( ( B e. V /\ C e. W ) -> ( ( topGen ` B ) C_ ( topGen ` C ) <-> B C_ ( topGen ` C ) ) ) $.
